name: Manuka Mumble
author: R. Holland
summary: A unique topping for hot cereal (like oatmeal) and other hot dishes. Or serve for snacking with nuts and dried fruit (excellent with walnuts and dried black mission figs)... a snackin' mumble (manuka plus jumble). A chilled, glass quart measuring cup is a good container for hand mixing these thick ingredients.
directions: Combine coconut oil and honey in a chilled bowl
Line a small tray with a sheet of plastic wrap; evenly spoon oil-honey mixture on top
Cover with another sheet of plastic wrap and press down to a 1/2-inch thickness using a tray of similar size
Remove top layer of plastic wrap and cut hardened mixture into bite-size squares
Place squares in the bottom of a large, chilled bowl
Sprinkle 1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon and 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg over squares, stir lightly
Sprinkle remaining 1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon and 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg on top
